> llms-full.txt - Comprehensive information for AI assistants

## Site Overview

**Site Name**: Don't Forget The Eighties
**Domain**: https://dft80s.band
**Purpose**: Professional website for a high-energy 1980s tribute band based in South Hampshire, UK
**Target Audience**: Event organizers, venues (pubs, clubs, festivals), private party hosts
**Primary Goal**: Drive bookings for live performances across Hampshire and the South Coast

## Business Information

**Band Name**: Don't Forget The Eighties
**Type**: Three-piece 1980s tribute band
**Location**: South Hampshire, UK
**Service Area**: Hampshire and the South Coast
**Active Period**: Currently taking bookings for 2026

### Performance Details
- **Venues**: Pubs, clubs, festivals, and private parties
- **Style**: High-energy live performances featuring iconic 80s hits
- **Genre Coverage**: New wave, synth-pop, ska, rock, chart-topping pop
- **Key Artists Covered**: Duran Duran, Spandau Ballet, Madness, The Police, The Jam, David Bowie, Talk Talk, New Order, Nik Kershaw, Thompson Twins, Def Leppard, Bon Jovi, and many more

### Band Characteristics
- Dynamic three-piece lineup
- Crowd-pleasing sing-along anthems
- Dancefloor-focused setlist
- Professional and high-impact performances
- Focus on recognizable 80s hits (no deep cuts)
